articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Intensive Striking Drill of KPA Artillery Units on Front
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Intensive Striking Drill of KPA Artillery Units on Front
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), Thursday guided an intensive artillery striking drill of KPA artillery units on the front.
					 Saying that December 1 is the first day when the combat and political training for the new year started, the Supreme Commander congratulated all the officers and men of the army who have turned out as one in the training.
					
					 The year 2017 is of significance as it marks the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the 85th founding anniversary of the KPA, he said, calling for a revolutionary turn in the combat and political training to adorn the next year with proud success in enhancing the fighting strength.
					
					 He mounted an observation post to learn about the deployment of fire positions of the artillery units and a plan for their artillery intensive striking drill.
					
					 Taking part in the striking drill were artillery sub-units of the defence detachments on islets in the West Sea on the front, tasked to strike the 6th marine brigade and the Yonphyong unit under the south Korean puppet Command for the Defense of Northwestern Islands, and mid- and long-range artillery sub-units on the front which are tasked to strike the military installations and the reactionary ruling organs in Seoul and other operational theaters of south Korea, the direction of main and secondary attacks on the front.
					
					 The drill was conducted in the way of volley and quick firing.
					
					 At an order given by Kim Jong Un, the KPA artillery units on the front kicked off the artillery firing.
					
					 Satisfied with the drill of striking the five islands in the southwest sea, including Paekryong and Yonphyong islands, and the enemy cities and military installations and reactionary ruling organs in the direction of the KPA's main attack, Kim Jong Un said that nobody and nothing would survive in such strike. And he stressed that if a war breaks out, such deadly strike should be inflicted upon the south Korean forces to completely break their will of counteraction at the start and make a clean sweep of them.
					
					 Hearing a resolve made by Ri Song Guk, commander of the KPA 4th Corps, to wipe out the enemies with merciless artillery strikes on their dens once the Supreme Commander gives an order, Kim Jong Un said that when a war of justice starts, the sound of gunfire for victory made by the artillery units on the southwestern front would greatly encourage other units of the KPA advancing southward.
					
					 The Supreme Commander expressed his great satisfaction over the successful artillery firing contest and intensive striking drill.
					
					 It is the WPK's view on giving importance to the artillery and artillery philosophy to open the gate to national reunification with the artillery and celebrate the victory of national reunification with fireworks displayed by the artillery, he said, adding that the Party has great belief and expectation in the artillery, the iron fist of the People's Army in a great war for national reunification.
					
					 Saying that a modern warfare is just an artillery duel and the application of the artillery in a modern war, which goes in three dimensions--sky, land and sea--irrespective of the front and the rear, is a major factor decisive of the victory in operation and combat, he set forth the important tasks for bolstering up the artillery force.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Lao President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Lao President
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greeting to Bounnang Vorachith, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic. 
					 In the message Kim Jong Un sent warm congratulations to the Lao president and the fraternal and friendly party, government and people of Laos on the 41st founding anniversary of the Lao People's Democratic Republic.
					
					 For 41 years the Lao government and people have achieved great successes in the work for defending the country and building the state under the correct leadership of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the message said.
					
					 Expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties and two countries provided by the preceding leaders would continue to develop in the interests of the two peoples, the message sincerely wished the Lao president happiness in good health and bigger successes in his responsible work.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Greets Lao PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Greets Lao PM
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Friday sent a message of greeting to Thong Loun Sisoulith, prime minister of Laos, on the 41st founding anniversary of the Lao People's Democratic Republic. 
					 In the message Pak Pong Ju said he was pleased over the great achievements of the Lao government and people in the work for socio-economic development and improving people's living standard for the past 41 years.
					
					 Expressing belief that the traditional and excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries will grow stronger in different fields, the message wished the Lao prime minister bigger successes in his work for development of the country.
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a similar message to Lao Foreign Minister Saleumxay Kommasith on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK-Cuba Friendship Will Last Forever: Choe Ryong Hae
articles.content:
DPRK-Cuba Friendship Will Last Forever: Choe Ryong Hae
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, was interviewed by the Cuba TV Broadcasting Friday. He is leading the DPRK party and state delegation on a visit Cuba to mourn the demise of Fidel Castro Ruz, supreme leader of the Cuban revolution.
					 The Korean people are in bitter grief together with the Cuban people upon the news of the demise of Fidel Castro Ruz, he said, and went on:
					
					 The demise of Fidel Castro Ruz is a great loss to the party, government and people of the DPRK and Cuba.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Cuban Embassy in Pyongyang to mourn the demise of Fidel Castro Ruz.
					
					 The mourning period was declared in the DPRK and leading officials of the party, state and the army and officials of the armed forces, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Cuban Embassy to mourn the demise of Fidel Castro Ruz.
					
					 This is a clear expression of fraternal and militant friendship between the DPRK and Cuba.
					
					 Fidel Castro Ruz is a close friend and old revolutionary comrade-in-arms of the Korean people.
					
					 Fidel Castro Ruz visited the DPRK in March 1986 and met with President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He exerted great efforts to strengthen militant fraternity and friendship between the peoples of the two countries fighting together at the outpost of the struggle against imperialism.
					
					 The friendship between the two countries provided by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il together with Fidel Castro Ruz will invariably develop under the deep care of Marshal Kim Jong Un and respected Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					 We are firmly convinced that the fraternal Cuban people would overcome the pain over the loss of their outstanding leader, firmly defend the country, revolution and socialism and achieve prosperity of the country under the guidance of Raul Castro Ruz. true to the lifetime intention of Fidel Castro Ruz.

articles.title: Letter to Bureau Director of Int'l Telecommunication Union
articles.content:
Letter to Bureau Director of Int'l Telecommunication Union
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong II, director of the Department of Radio Control of the Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Thursday sent a letter to Francois Rancy, director of the Radiocommunication Bureau of the International Telecommunication Union.
					 The letter said:
					
					 The Ministry of Post and Telecommunications of the DPRK would like to remind the Radiocommunication Bureau of the International Telecommunication Union of its previous requests for hard actions by the Bureau, regarding the several reports of violent infringement by south Korean Administration on Article 42 of ITU Constitution and No. 15.1 of ITU Radio Regulations.
					
					 The Ministry has received 9 replies from the Bureau that it had already informed the south Korean Administration of the above-mentioned infringement. 
					
					 However, the south Korean Administration deliberately continue to emit the TV broadcast signals on 4 channels (channel 7, 8, 10, 11) on our analog TV broadcasting system towards the territory of the DPRK, thus causing serious interference to our TV broadcasting channels.
					
					 Recently, it has taken harmful actions by increasing the duration of TV broadcasting from the previous 16 hours to 20 hours.
					
					 In this regards, the DPRK Ministry of Post and Telecommunications would like to request the Radiocommunication Bureau to take decisive and immediate measures on this issue once again.

articles.title: Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee Lashes out at UNSC "Sanctions Resolution"
articles.content:
Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee Lashes out at UNSC "Sanctions Resolution"
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee released a statement on Saturday lashing out at the anti-DPRK "sanctions resolution No. 2321" the U.S.-led hostile forces cooked up by abusing the name of the UNSC on Nov. 30.
					 The "resolution" once again proved that the UNSC, obliged to regard it as its mission to ensure the rights to independence and existence of member states, has been reduced to a nominal puppet international body, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee clarifies the following principled stand of the DPRK in connection with the fact that the U.S.-led hostile forces conspired with each other to deny outright the legitimate rights of the DPRK, a justice-loving sovereign state, and persist in their reckless moves to isolate and stifle it:
					
					1. We resolutely reject the UNSC "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK as an unheard-of hideous provocation to it.
					
					The "resolution" reflecting the U.S. inveterate repugnance toward the DPRK is the worst-ever violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK. It stretches out its tentacles to even the sector of the living of the people in the DPRK under the signboard of "filling the gaps" of the "sanctions" imposed in the past on it.
					
					 It is self-evident that such "resolution" invented by the U.S.-led hostile forces, which totally deny the sovereignty and vital rights of the DPRK, will enrage its army and people.
					
					2. It is the principled stand of the DPRK that if the "sanctions resolution" adopted by the UNSC is attributable to the nuclear weapons and rockets just as claimed, the U.S. should first face the harshest sanctions as the very one chiefly responsible for them.
					
					 The U.S. is entirely to blame for spawning the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which compelled the DPRK to emerge as a nuclear power in the East, possessed of a variety of powerful rockets.
					
					 It will be the supreme and urgent task of the UN to strictly check the moves of the U.S. wantonly violating peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia and keenly seeking a chance to launch a war.
					
					3. The army and people of the DPRK will smash the ferocious "sanctions" by the U.S. and its vassal forces through the toughest counteractions and thus reliably defend the sovereignty of their country and vital rights of the nation.
					
					 The more desperate moves of the U.S. to infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and deny outright its rights to existence and development under absurd pretexts will only spark the latter's tougher countermeasures and result in imperiling the security of the U.S. and economic interests of countries to be involved in the sanctions racket.
					
					 The world will clearly see that the jungle law-based brigandish logic pursued by the "sanctions resolution" to wantonly violate the supreme interests of the DPRK can never work.

articles.title: U.S. Moves to Create Triangular Military Alliance for Aggression under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Moves to Create Triangular Military Alliance for Aggression under Fire
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea issued a statement Friday as regards the disclosure of the fact that the agreement on protecting military intelligence was concluded between the Park Geun Hye group of traitors and the Japanese reactionaries under the backstage manipulation and pressure of the U.S.
					 The statement says:
					
					 Judging from the fact that the U.S. made sure that the Park group more dead than alive inked the agreement at the negotiations according to its scenario, the conclusion of the agreement was prompted by the U.S. political and military interests.
					
					 The U.S. put pressure on the puppet regime to allow the deployment of THAAD in south Korea and to conclude even the above-said agreement with the Japanese reactionaries, thus entering a full-scale stage in carrying out its strategy for gaining hegemony over the neighboring powers and putting the security on the Korean peninsula and in the region at serious peril.
					
					 The keynote of the U.S. strategy for dominating Asia is to create a triangular military alliance with south Korea and Japan and thus lay a siege not only to the DPRK but to China and Russia and gain military supremacy in Northeast Asia.
					
					 It is another aim sought by the U.S. to bolster up its ever-waning political and military muscle with the help of junior allies.
					
					 The reality clearly proves that the U.S. is the arch criminal disturbing peace and stability on the peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia and escalating military tensions and danger of war there.
					
					 The U.S. should roll back its anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK, drop the reckless daydream of dominating Asia and stop the extremely dangerous moves to form the triangular military alliance.

articles.title: Joint Press Release Issued for Great Meeting of Koreans for Reunification
articles.content:
Joint Press Release Issued for Great Meeting of Koreans for Reunification 
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The north side, south side and overseas side preparatory committees for a nationwide great meeting of for reunification issued the following joint press release on Friday:
					 A working session of the north side, south side and overseas side preparatory committees for a nationwide great meeting for reunification was held in Shenyang, China from November 30 to December 1 amid the growing interests and expectation of Koreans at home and abroad for the meeting.
					
					 It decided to hold a nationwide great meeting for reunification without fail to bring about a new turning phase in the drive for peace of the country, improvement of the north-south relations and national reunification to the will of all Koreans.
					
					 It also decided to name the meeting "the nationwide meeting of the Koreans for peace and reunification of the country and improvement of the north-south relations", fully reflecting the will of Koreans of various circles at home and abroad hoping for the successful meeting.
					
					 It decided to form a joint working committee of Koreans in the north, the south and abroad for preparing the nationwide meeting and continue to discuss and push ahead with detailed technical issues.

articles.title: Briefing Held for Diplomatic Envoys Here
articles.content:
Briefing Held for Diplomatic Envoys Here
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The Foreign Ministry of the DPRK organized a briefing for diplomatic envoys here on Friday as regards the fact that a new "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK was cooked up at the UN Security Council on Nov. 30.
					 At the briefing Han Song Ryol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, referred to the principled stand of the DPRK on the UNSC's "sanctions revolution" against the DPRK.
					
					 "Sanctions resolution" taking issue with the DPRK over its nuclear warhead explosion test held in September last was fabricated by the UNSC, he noted, saying the DPRK totally rejects it as another excess of authority and violation of sovereignty by the UNSC totally denying the sovereignty of the DPRK, going beyond its authority.
					
					 It is the U.S. that spawned the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula and it is also the U.S. that pushed the DPRK to have access nuclear weapons, he said, stressing that the successful nuclear warhead explosion test conducted by the DPRK in September last is a demonstration of the toughest will of its army and people that they are ready to react to the provocation of the enemies as it is part of the DPRK's practical countermeasure to the nuclear threat and sanctions of the U.S. and other hostile forces persistently pulling up the DPRK over its exercise of the right to self-defense.
					
					 The UNSC has no authority to prohibit a sovereign state from exercising its right to self-defense such as steps for bolstering defense capabilities including nuclear test and there is no provision in the UN Charter and any international law which stipulates that nuclear test poses threat to international peace and security, he said, adding:
					
					 That is why the UN Office has not given any answer to a letter of the DPRK's delegate to the UN who requested the UN secretary general to settle the legal contradiction of the "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK in May last though six months have passed.
					
					 It is the very wise and just option proven in practice that the DPRK has built a powerful deterrence while overcoming difficulties after shaping it as a state line to go nuclear. Obama and his lackeys are seriously mistaken if they think they can make the DPRK abandon its line of going nuclear or undermine its position as a nuclear power through their base sanctions and pressure. The "sanctions resolution" denying the DPRK's sovereignty and rights to existence and development will tough off its more powerful countermeasures for self-defense.
					
					 Diplomatic envoys said they have a clear viewpoint on the stand of the DPRK on the UNSC's "sanctions resolution".

articles.title: Guinean President on Relationship with DPRK
articles.content:
Guinean President on Relationship with DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Alpha Conde, president of Guinea, said he is rejoiced over the achievements made by the DPRK people in building an economic power and improving the people's standard of living under the wise guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un. And he hoped for great progress in the DPRK people's struggle for national reunification and building of a socialist power.
					 The president expressed this stand on Nov. 26 when Kim Jun Gap, DPRK ambassador to his country, paid a farewell call on him.
					
					 He declared that the Guinean government and people would invariably and fully support the just cause of the DPRK government and people and do their best to further strengthen the long-standing relations of friendship and cooperation with the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry's Memorandum Distributed as Official Document of UNSC
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry's Memorandum Distributed as Official Document of UNSC
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Foreign Ministry's memorandum "The DPRK's strengthening of its nuclear force is a righteous choice to defend itself from the extreme moves of the U.S. to stifle it" was distributed as the UN Security Council's official document S/2016/988 Thursday.

articles.title: Exhibition on Achievements of UAWK Opens
articles.content:
Exhibition on Achievements of UAWK Opens
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- An exhibition on the achievements of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) opened with due ceremony at the People's Palace of Culture on Friday to mark the 8th Congress of the UAWK.
					 On display at the exhibition are more than 650 pieces of 45 kinds showing the achievements and 60-odd visual aids prepared by the Central Committee and provincial committees of the UAWK.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Ri Il Hwan, department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the UAWK, and officials and members of the union.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants looked around the venue of the exhibition.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean News Service (KNS) of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) led by Director Choe Hong, staying here to attend the celebrations of the 70th anniversary of the Korean Central News Agency, on Friday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 The delegation laid a bunch of flowers before the statues and paid homage to the great leaders.
					
					 An art troupe of Korean schoolchildren in Japan led by O Haeng Dok, vice-director of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, too, visited the statues on the same day.

articles.title: Skin Analyzer Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Skin Analyzer Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- College of Computer Science under Kim Il Sung University of the DPRK has recently developed a skin analyzer.
					 The analyzer gives detailed answers to 7 indicators for the state of face skin, including moisture, wrinkle and pimple, and evaluates them in comparison with normal values on screen, so as to help its users select proper cosmetics.
					
					 The analyzer won high appraisal at the recent 27th national exhibition of IT achievements, enjoying popularity among women.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace in the DPRK is a comprehensive extracurricular education center for schoolchildren and a pedigree establishment for cultivating their talents.
					 For the past one year after it was remodeled under the loving care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, it has made a number of achievements by improving educational contents and methods.
					
					 The palace has produced 10-odd winners of the July 15 Honor Student Prize, over 50 reserve singers and instrumental players and several hundreds of graduates with technical qualifications and medalists.
					
					 Particularly, members of its sci-tech groups took the first place in national coding contest and national basic science contest this year.
					
					 Members of its sports groups have bagged over 180 gold medals, 70 silvers and 100 bronzes at different national games, including the 42nd National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize and the 53rd National Sports Contest of Juvenile Sports Schools.
					
					 The exhibitions of teaching aids and artistry presentations of guidance teachers served as important occasions for educators and coaches of the palace to raise their competence. Among them over 10 teachers were honored with the October 8 Model Professor and received new teaching method certificates.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's "Talk to People" Termed Mockery of Public
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's "Talk to People" Termed Mockery of Public
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye of south Korea made a "talk to the people", the third one, on Nov. 29. The imbecile of Chongwadae who stammered out the just one page statement for four and a half minutes hurriedly left to avoid questions by media persons.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday terms the publication of the "talk" a crafty gimmick to tide over the present crisis, adding this is a shameless act of mocking the people without being aware of what hideous crimes she committed.
					
					 It says:
					
					 People are shocked by her fabrication of such crafty vocabulary as "cutting down term" without expressing a stand on immediate resignation unanimously demanded by the south Koreans from all walks of life but leaving it to the "National Assembly" to handle it.
					
					 Traitor Park talked such rubbish that she leaves all issues to the "NA" to decide, a crafty trick to elicit fighting between the ruling and opposite camps, stem the political trend for impeachment, buy time and rally conservative forces and thus weather the crisis.
					
					 No matter how desperately she may try to find a way out, the table has already turned unfavorable for her.
					
					 The south Korean newspaper Hangyore shortly ago said that no matter how craftily Park may try, she cannot undo her crimes and that it is already too late to seek sympathy from the people and the only way out for her is to step down as soon as possible.
					
					 There is no other way for the haggard old witch of Chongwadae.
					
					 The only way out for her is to face a stern punishment of history and the nation without regret.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Long U.S.-Japan History of Conspiracy for Invading Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on History of U.S.-Japan of Conspiracy for Invading Korea
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- It is 108 years since the criminal "Root-Takahira agreement" was fabricated whereby the U.S. imperialists provided a final guarantee for the Japanese imperialists' policy of occupying Korea.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article that the U.S. and Japan began conspiring with each other out of their common interests in the scenario for invading Korea after watching for a chance to swallow up it from long ago.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 In July 1905 the "Katsura-Taft agreement" was signed. Under this agreement the U.S. acknowledged the Japanese imperialists' occupation of Korea and domination over it. In return for this Japan promised not to intervene in the U.S. colonial domination over the Philippines.
					
					 On Nov. 30, 1908 the then U.S. state secretary Root and the then Japanese ambassador to the U.S. Takahira signed an "agreement" on "maintaining the status quo in the Pacific region" by way of exchanging memorandum.
					
					 The agreements were products of despicable conspiracy in which the U.S. imperialists' brigandish and crafty nature and the Japanese militarists' inveterate bad habit of invasion and sinister nature backed by big powers were intertwined.
					
					 It was because of those aggressive and brigandish documents that the Korean nation fell victim to the U.S. and Japanese imperialists for a long period, being subject to all sorts of shame and disgrace such as military occupation, colonial domination and tragedy of division and war disaster, with its national development seriously hamstrung.
					
					 The history of conspiracy between the U.S. and Japan for aggression persists even today.
					
					 Their ambition to dominate Korea through conspiracy is a daydream.
					
					 Should the U.S. and Japan keep going reckless through conspiracy, the army and people of the DPRK will reduce to ashes the citadel of aggression with the might of Songun built for decades and thus put an end to the history of U.S. and Japan interwoven with crimes.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Parties Denounce Park Geun Hye's "Talk to People"
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Parties Denounce Park Geun Hye's "Talk to People"
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- South Korean opposition parties bitterly denounced traitor Park Geun Hye's "talk to people" which insulted the people once again on Nov. 29, according to the south Korean CBS, MBC and KBS.
					 The representative of the Minju Party said Park's "talk to people" is nothing but the scheme to escape from possible impeachment.
					
					 The former representative of the Minju Party said the "president's" entrusting the issue of her retirement to the "National Assembly" is the political plot to split the political forces in the NA.
					
					 The chairman of the Emergency Measure Committee of the Kukmin Party and the permanent representative and spokesman of the Jongui Party rejected the "president's" "talk to people."

articles.title: S. Korean Media Denounce Park Geun Hye's Gimmick to Evade Resignation
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Denounce Park Geun Hye's Gimmick to Evade Resignation 
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean media denounced the Part Geun Hye's "talk to people" as a political gimmick to weather the crisis and prolong her remaining days on Nov. 29 and 30.
					 The internet paper Voice of People in an editorial said that since the second "talk to people" more than one million people gathered at the Kwanghwamun plaza in Seoul and demanded the "president" immediately step down, but she asserted that the she did no wrongdoings and if the "National Assembly" makes a road map for her resign, she will follow it. She seems to think that she still has prestige and authority to exercise, the paper added.
					
					 CBS denounced Park's act of entrusting the issue of resignation to the NA as a trick to procrastinate the time in a bid to evade the impeachment.
					
					 Kyunghyang Daily News and Hangyore in editorials said that the talk betrayed the people's expectation again and touched off great despair and anger of the public.

articles.title: Public Protests to Remove Park Geun Hye from Power Launched across S. Korea
articles.content:
Public Protests to Remove Park Geun Hye from Power Launched across S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The "first general strike and day of citizens' disobedience" campaign was simultaneously launched throughout south Korea on Nov. 30 in order to remove Park Geun Hye at any cost as she is evading the responsibility for the scandal and rejecting the demands for her resignation despite the strong protests and condemnations by the south Korean people from all walks of life, according to reports.
					 The Confederation of Trade Unions simultaneously waged a general strike in 16 parts of south Korea in demand of the resignation of Park who mercilessly trampled the life of the workers by enforcing the pro-plutocrats policy, and the repeal of the policy.
					
					 More than 1,500 traders declared the campaign and joined in the rally of the confederation for the general strike.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's "Talk to People" Rejected in S. Korea
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's "Talk to People" Rejected in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- According to reports from Seoul, on Nov. 29 traitor Park Geun Hye made public "talk to people" failing to reflect a lot of crimes she committed before the south Korean people and all other Koreans. 
					 Her "talk to people" that mocked at the mindset of people aroused strong rejection and denunciation from the south Korean people of different social standings.
					
					 A permanent member of the Emergency People's Action for Resignation of Park Geun Hye Regime who is chairman of the Executive Committee of the Joint Council of Civic and Public Organizations expressed the will to keep action till Park Geun Hye makes unconditional "resignation".
					
					 A spokesman and other senior officials of the Emergency People's Action also rejected Park's "talk to people." 
					
					 The secretary general of the Reunification Association of the Citizens Federation for Economic Justice branded Park's "talk to people" as a means to make the public focus get blurred before the "National Assembly" deals with the impeachment bill.
					
					 The co-chief secretary of the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society said Park Geun Hye deceived the people once again.
					
					 The secretary general of the Joint Council of Civic and Public Organizations declared that the candlelight rally and other actions for resignation of Park Geun Hye will go on.
					
					 The Taejon Headquarters of the Movement for Resignation of Park Geun Hye launched anti-Park Geun Hye action, saying that Park denied the people's intention and she can never be pardoned.

articles.title: Disbandment of "Saenuri Party" Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Disbandment of "Saenuri Party" Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online newspaper Voice of People on Thursday carried an editorial demanding the disbandment of the "Saenuri Party".
					 The editorial recalled that after Park Geun Hye made her third "talk to people" the "Saenuri Party" requested the opposition parties to discuss the procedures for impeaching Park again.
					
					 Branding the "Saenuri Party" as a group of accomplices in all crimes of the "president" and the biggest group of her servants, it warned that the "Saenuri Party" would perish in the flames of one-million candlelight actions.

articles.title: Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Bird flu occurred in Richon and Ansong of Kyonggi Province, south Korea, on Nov. 30, according to its KBS.
					 Earlier, bird flu attacked Yangju in the province.
					
					 Consequently, the number of towns and counties of south Korea afflicted by bird flu increased to 13 and millions of fowls were culled in 75 places.

articles.title: Koreans in China Support S. Koreans' Struggle for Ousting Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
Koreans in China Support S. Koreans' Struggle for Ousting Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Korean residents in China released statements on Nov. 24 in support of the south Korean people's struggle for the resignation of traitor Park Geun Hye.
					 Noting the south Korean people's anger at Park is running high, the Liaoning Regional Association under the General Association of Koreans in China said in its statement that Park should step down as early as possible for her hideous scandal as demanded by south Koreans.
					
					 The Dalian City Branch of the General Association said in a statement that all Korean residents in the city fully support the south Korean people's candle-light actions to force Park to step down.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Denmark
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Denmark
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- A national committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Copenhagen, Denmark on Nov. 26.
					 H. Jacobsen, member of the Leadership of the Communist Party in Denmark, and Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, were elected co-chairmen of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Malaysia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Malaysia
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- A Malaysian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed on Nov. 29.
					 The general manager of the Malaysia-Korea Tourist Company Ltd, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee set a remembrance period from Nov. 29 to Dec. 17 and decided to organize political and cultural events such as seminar, photo exhibition and film show.

articles.title: Briefing on DPRK Foreign Ministry's Memorandum Given in Nigeria
articles.content:
Briefing on DPRK Foreign Ministry's Memorandum Given in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- A briefing on the DPRK Foreign Ministry's memorandum was given at the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association on Nov. 23.
					 Briefing on the memorandum, Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Association, said that the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons is a clear result of the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threat against it.
					
					 A former lawmaker said:
					
					 It is a legitimate right of a sovereign state to build self-defensive capability in coping with outsiders' move for aggression.
					
					 It is a decisive guarantee for defending the country's sovereignty to cope with threat of a nuclear war with nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The DPRK's self-defensive capability reached a high level under the wise guidance of the great leaders.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers should recognize the DPRK's nuclear strike capability, properly understand its strategic position and make a correct option.
					
					 The participants in the briefing expressed their determination to conduct more positive activities for supporting the Korean people's just cause, saying that Juche Korea making a leap forward day by day while demonstrating its power is an example in the present times.

articles.title: Work of Kim Jong Un Introduced in Poland
articles.content:
Work of Kim Jong Un Introduced in Poland
 Pyongyang, December 2 (KCNA) -- The Polish website "Democratic People's Republic of Korea" on Nov. 26 carried supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 The work published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble life dedicated to the country and the people.
					
					 It also clarifies the important matters in applying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 The website carried his photos.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de golpe convergente de fuego de unidades artilleras
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de golpe convergente de fuego de unidades artilleras
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio el dia primero el entrenamiento de golpe convergente de fuego de las unidades artilleras del frente del EPC.
					El Comandante Supremo felicito a los oficiales y soldados de todo el ejercito que acogen el primer dia del entrenamiento combativo-politico de nuevo ano.
					
					Senalo que 2017 es un ano significativo en que se celebraran el aniversario 105 del nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el 75 del natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el 85 de la fundacion del EPC y llamo a registrar un viraje revolucionario en los ejercicios combativo-politicos del nuevo ano para glorificar el ano proximo con los exitos orgullosos del fortalecimiento de combatividad del ejercito.
					
					En el puesto de la vigilancia, el Comandante Supremo escucho el parte sobre la ubicacion de la posicion de fuego de las unidades artilleras del EPC y el plan de los ejercicios de golpe de fuego artillero.
					
					En el entrenamiento tomaron parte las subunidades artilleras de la unidad de defensa de las islas de la linea avanzada de las areas maritimas del frente sudoeste con la mision de eliminar la sexta brigada marina y la unidad estacionada en la isla Yonphyong, adscritas a la comandancia titere de defensa de las islas de noroeste del Sur de Corea, y las otras artilleras de mediano y largo alcance del frente, que asumen la mision de golpear principalmente la ciudad de Seul y otros blancos principales del frente y auxiliarmente los objetos militares y los organos de gobernacion reaccionaria extendidos en el teatro operacional del Sur de Corea.
					
					Los ejercicios se desarrollaron de manera de fuegos simultaneo y rapido.
					
					Segun la orden del Comandante Supremo, las unidades artilleros del frente del EPC, abrieron el fuego.
					
					Los ejercicios hacen imaginar un espectaculo alusivo a las 5 islas del mar suroeste, incluso Paekryong y Yonphyong, las ciudades, los objetos militares e organos de gobernacion reaccionaria de los enemigos situados en la direccion de golpe principal del EPC, en llamas.
					
					Si estalla la guerra, con el primer golpe hay que doblegar completamente la voluntad de enfrentamiento del Sur de Corea y eliminar a todos los enemigos si hacen desesperaciones ultimas, puntualizo.
					
					Tras evaluar la decision del jefe del cuarto cuerpo del EPC Ri Song Guk quien dijo que si da la orden el Comandante Supremo, borrara todos los nidos enemigos con el implacable golpe artillero, Kim Jong Un subrayo que si se inicia la guerra justa, el fuego de las unidades artilleras del frente suroeste animara a las unidades del EPC que avanzan hacia el sur.
					
					El Comandante Supremo expreso gran satisfaccion por haber realizado exitosamente la competencia de fuego artillero y los ejercicios de golpe de fuego concentrado de unidades artilleras.
					
					Iniciar con la artilleria la guerra de reunificacion de la patria y celebrar la victoria tambien con el disparo de las salvas de esta arma constituyen la concepcion y filosofia de dar prioridad a la artilleria de nuestro partido, asevero y anadio que son muy grandes la confianza y esperanza del partido en la artilleria, puno de acero del EPC.
					
					Dijo que en la guerra moderna que se libra de manera tridimensional tanto en el frente como en la retaguardia, la aplicacion de artilleria decide el triunfo o fracaso de la operacion y el combate. Y presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan en el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas artilleras.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita 41o aniversario de la RDPL
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita 41o aniversario de la RDPL
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 2 un mensaje de felicitacion a Bounnhang Vorachith, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y Presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					En ocasion del 41o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, extiendo cordiales felicitaciones a Vd. y a los fraternales y amistosos partido, gobierno y pueblo laosianos.
					
					Durante 41 anos pasados, el gobierno y el pueblo de Laos obtuvieron grandes exitos en la defensa de la patria y la construccion del Estado bajo la correcta orientacion del PPRL.
					
					Convencido de que seguiran ampliandose y desarrollandose conforme a los intereses de ambos pueblos las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre nuestros dos partidos y paises, preparadas por los lideres antecesores, formulo sinceros votos por la buena salud y felicidad de Vd. y por los exitos mas grandes en sus responsabilidades.

articles.title: Presidente guineo expone decision de desarrollar relaciones de amistad con RPDC
articles.content:
Presidente guineo expone decision de desarrollar relaciones de amistad con RPDC
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario coreano en Guinea, Kim Jun Gap, realizo el 26 de noviembre una visita de despedida al presidente guineo, Alpha Conde.
					Diciendo estar complacido de que bajo la sabia orientacion de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un, el pueblo coreano alcanzara exitos en la construccion de potencia economica, el mejoramiento de las condiciones de su vida y otros dominios, el mandatario deseo gran avance en la futura lucha por la reunificacion del pais y la construccion de potencia socialista. 
					
					Apunto que el gobierno y pueblo de Guinea apoyaran invariablemente la justa causa del gobierno y pueblo coreanos y se esforzaran en todo lo posible por fortalecer y desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con el hermano pueblo coreano que tienen larga tradicion historica.

articles.title: Ri Yong Il envia carta a director de la Union Internacional de Telecomunicaciones
articles.content:
Ri Yong Il envia carta a director de la Union Internacional de Telecomunicaciones 
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Ri Yong Il, director de Control de Radio del Ministerio de Comunicaciones de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, remitio la vispera una carta a Fran~ois Raney, director del Buro de Radiocomunicacion de la Union Internacional de Telecomunicaciones (UIT).
					La misiva senala que el Ministerio de Comunicaciones de la RPDC quisiera recordar al Buro de Radiocomunicacion de la UIT de sus anteriores peticiones sobre las medidas fuertes del Buro frente a varios reportes de las infracciones flagrantes del articulo 42 de la Constitucion de la UIT y el 15.1 de los Reglamentos de Radio por parte de la administracion surcoreana de comunicaciones, y prosigue:
					
					El Ministerio de Comunicaciones de la RPDC ha recibido 9 respuestas del Buro de que ha informado ya a la administracion surcoreana sobre las infracciones arriba mencionadas.
					
					Sin embargo, la administracion surcoreana sigue emitiendo deliberadamente hacia el territorio de la RPDC las senales de transmision de TV sobre 4 canales (7, 8, 10 y 11) del nuestro sistema televisivo del tipo analogo, lo cual esta causando seria interferencia sobre nuestros canales televisivos.
					
					Recientemente, la administracion surcoreana cometio la grave accion de ampliar de 16 a 20 horas la duracion de sus transmisiones televisivas. 
					
					Al respecto, el Ministerio de Comunicaciones de la RPDC quisiera pedir al Buro de Radiocomunicacion que tome una vez mas decisivas e inmediatas medidas para ese problema.

articles.title: CCPAP rechaza la resolucion de sancion no. 2321 contra la RPDC
articles.content:
CCPAP rechaza la resolucion de sancion no. 2321 contra la RPDC
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que las fuerzas hostiles encabezadas por los Estados Unidos fabricaron de nuevo el 30 de noviembre la resolucion de sancion no. 2321 abusando del nombre del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, el Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) hizo publica este viernes una declaracion que sigue:
					La presente "resolucion de sancion" demuestra otra vez que es un aparato internacional fantoche y nominal el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que asume la mision de asegurar los derechos independientes y el derecho a la existencia de los paises miembros 
					
					Las fuerzas hostiles encabezadas por EE.UU. se confabulan para negar totalmente los derechos legitimos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Estado soberano y justiciero, y recurren incesantemente a las imprudentes maniobras de aislamiento y aplastamiento contra este pais socialista.
					
					Al respecto, el CCPAP expone la siguiente posicion de principios:
					
					1. Rechazamos tajantemente la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC recien aprobada en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU calificandola de provocacion sin precedentes contra la RPDC. 
					
					La presente "resolucion de sancion" refleja el veto a la RPDC de EE.UU. y resulta la mas brutal violacion de la soberania de la RPDC. 
					
					Bajo el pretexto de cubrir la "falta de sancion" ejercida hasta la fecha, EE.UU. extiende los tentaculos hasta en lo profundo de la vida del pueblo coreano.
					
					Por supuesto, provoca gran indignacion del ejercito y pueblo coreanos esta "resolucion" inventada por las fuerzas hostiles bajo el mando de EE.UU. que niega totalmente la soberania y el derecho a la subsistencia de la RPDC. 
					
					2. Si la presente "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU fue aprobada por el problema de armas nucleares y cohetes, se debe imponer la sancion mas dura a EE.UU. Esto es nuestra posicion de principios. 
					
					El causante del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana es precisamente el imperio americano.
					
					EE.UU. nos empujo a tomar la posicion de potencia nuclear del Oriente y poseer los poderosos cohetes diversificados. 
					
					Frustrar las maniobras de EE.UU., que vulnera gravemente la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico y acecha la oportunidad de la agresion y la guerra, sera la tarea primordial e inminente para la ONU. 
					
					3. El ejercito y pueblo coreanos defenderan fidedignamente la soberania nacional y el derecho a la subsistencia de la nacion frustrando con las contramedidas superintransigentes la "sancion" de EE.UU. y sus seguidores. 
					
					Si EE.UU. ejerce la amenaza sobre la nacion coreana infringiendo la soberania nacional y negando totalmente el derecho a la subsistencia y al desarrollo bajo pretextos injustos, causara las contramedidas mas fuertes de la RPDC y perjudicara seriamente la seguridad de si mismo y los intereses economicos de los paises participantes en la sancion. 
					
					El mundo vera claramente que no surtira efecto la logica de la ley de selva que persigue la presente "resolucion de sancion" que viola gravemente los maximos intereses de la RPDC.

articles.title: CNCDP exige a EE.UU. dejar el intento de fabricar la alianza militar tripartita
articles.content:
CNCDP exige a EE.UU. dejar el intento de fabricar la alianza militar tripartita  
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Se conocio recientemente que la firma del acuerdo de proteccion de informaciones militares entre la camarilla traidora surcoreana de Park Geun-hye y los reaccionarios japoneses fue producto de control trasero e imposicion de EE.UU.
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) hizo publica el dia 2 una declaracion que sigue:
					
					Segun el guion trazado por EE.UU., la banda de Park Geun-hye, convertida ya en "momia viva", acudio a las negociaciones sobre dicho pacto militar con Japon y lo firmo definitivamente. Este hecho deja conocer que ese documento conviene totalmente a los intereses politicos y militares de EE.UU. que anteriormente, impuso a los titeres surcoreanos el despliegue del sistema antimisiles THAAD en el suelo surcoreano.
					
					Asi entro en etapa crucial la implementacion de la estrategia hegemonica de EE.UU. para tomar la superioridad de fuerza en el Nordeste Asiatico y doblegar a las potencias regionales.
					
					Como resultado, se ve amenazada gravemente la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region. 
					
					Lo clave de la agresiva estrategia de EE.UU. de dominar Asia esta en establecer la alianza militar tripartita bajo su control con el Sur de Corea y Japon para formar asi el cerco sobre la RPDC, China y Rusia y tomar la hegemonia militar en la region del Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					Otro objetivo reside en utilizar a sus aliados inferiores para reforzar su poderio politico y militar en decadencia. 
					
					La realidad demuestra claramente que EE.UU. es el autor que perturba la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico y busca la tension militar y la crisis de guerra. 
					
					EE.UU. debe cancelar su anacronica politica hostil a la RPDC y dejar su imprudente intento de dominar Asia y fabricar la alianza militar tripartita que producira graves consecuencias.

articles.title: Publicado comunicado conjunto de comites preparatorios del Norte, el Sur y el Ultramar
articles.content:
Publicado comunicado conjunto de comites preparatorios del Norte, el Sur y el Ultramar 
Pyongyang, 2 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El comite preparatorio de la parte Norte, el grupo de planificacion para la promocion de la parte Sur y el comite preparatorio de la parte ultramarina para el gran acto pannacional por la reunificacion publicaron el dia primero el siguiente comunicado conjunto:
					En medio de que se elevan cada dia mas la atencion y la esperanza de todos los coreanos dentro y fuera del pais sobre el gran acto pannacional por la reunificacion, tuvo lugar del 30 de noviembre al primero de diciembre en Shenyang de China, la reunion de trabajo del comite preparatorio de la parte Norte, el grupo de planificacion para la promocion de la parte Sur y el comite preparatorio de la parte ultramarina.
					
					Reflejando la unanime voluntad de toda la nacion, los participantes se acordaron celebrar sin falta el gran acto pannacional por la reunificacion para abrir una nueva coyuntura de viraje para la paz del pais, la mejora de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Y decidieron denominarlo como conferencia pannacional para la paz y reunificacion de la patria y el desarrollo de las relaciones Norte-Sur, reflejando suficientemente la voluntad de los coreanos de diferentes estratos dentro y fuera del pais que desean la celebracion de la cita pannacional. 
					
					El foro decidio constituir el comite conjunto de trabajo del Norte, el Sur y el Ultramar para los preparativos de la conferencia pannacional y discutir y promover de continuo los detalles de los problemas practicos.
